skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: four of countries
des:
Challenge your knowledge daily and learn curiosities of all countries, including their cultures, history, economy and many more.

“Four of countries” uses Alexa's voice profiles feature to recognize each player's voice. This allows multiple people in the household to get 4 different questions on a daily basis, which will cause their scores to be recorded individually. Learn more about voice profiles here:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GYY4637XC2STFL9R

Answer the questions by saying the number associated with one of the answers; if you do not know the answer, you can use a "HINT" to obtain additional information about the question, or you can also use a "REMOVER" that eliminates 2 incorrect answers from the 4 options; weekly you will receive 4 Hints and 4 Removers. If in one day you get the 4 correct answers, you will get 4 additional questions, that will help you increase your points.

⭐ Saturdays and Sundays are double point days, so don't miss those days!

What else can I get?
⭐ 40 question packs, with this you will find more detailed information about the events of one or several countries.
⭐ Premium Club, get DOUBLE the benefits of this Trivia !!

-To get information that brings you closer to the answer, say: "Alexa, use a hint."
-To remove 2 wrong answers say: "Alexa, use a remover".
-Do you want to know your scoreboard? Just say: "Alexa, what is the current score?"
-To delete a user's records say: "Alexa, delete a user."
-To know the question packs say "Alexa, what question packs do you have".
-To play a question pack say: "Alexa, use a question pack."
-To listen to the last message again, say: "Alexa, repeat."
-For more details of the trivia, say: "Alexa, help".
-To exit the trivia, say: "Alexa, cancel."

You can also find this skill with touch interaction on some Alexa devices!

Under user approval, this skill requests permission to edit and create reminders to help you not to miss your daily questions.
If you have any comments or suggestions on how to make this trivia more entertaining please contact us at oivon.developer@gmail.com
